title: EDR systems
extract: Enterprise data replication (EDR) is the process of copying or moving enterprise data from one storage system to another. EDR began as database replication, when it involved moving a set of data from one database to another database of the same kind.
extract_html: Enterprise data replication (EDR) is the process of copying or moving enterprise data from one storage system to another. EDR began as database replication, when it involved moving a set of data from one database to another database of the same kind.
